experiment_ontology_uri.description: (Ontology: OBI) links to experiment ontology information.

library_strategy.description: (Controlled Vocabulary) The assay used. These are defined within the SRA metadata specifications with a controlled vocabulary (e.g. ‘Bisulfite-Seq’, ‘RNA-Seq’, ‘ChIP-Seq’). For a complete list, see https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/submit/reads-library-strategy.

reference_registry_id.description: The EpiRR ID for this dataset.

molecule_ontology_uri.description: (Ontology: SO) links to molecule ontology information.

molecule.description: (Controlled Vocabulary) The type of molecule that was extracted from the biological material. Include one of the following: total RNA, polyA RNA, cytoplasmic RNA, nuclear RNA, genomic DNA, protein, or other.
